description: Fifth (unsigned) column sequence of triangle A062140 (generalized a=4 Laguerre).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: (1+32*x+168*x^2+224*x^3+70*x^4)/(1-x)^13.a(n)=A062140(n+4, 4) = (n+4)!*binomial(n+8, 8)/4!.If we define f(n,i,x)= sum(sum(binomial(k,j)*stirling1(n,k)*stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j),j=i..k),k=i..n) then a(n-4)=(-1)^n*f(n,4,-9), (n>=4). [From _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009]
prog: (PARI) { f=6; for (n=0, 100, f*=n + 4; write("b062262.txt", n, " ", f*binomial(n + 8, 8)/24) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 03 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
